description: Awayuki Mawata is 14 years old. Intelligent and composed, Mawata is the seemingly perfect child of the family. However, her outwardly calm demeanor is used as a facade to hide her loneliness and mask her own sense of loss after her parents divorce. Ultimately, Mawata`s grief is used by Fenrir to fuel the Great Tree of Fenrir.
name: Awayuki Mawata
